title: Employers Want More From College Grads
teaser: According to a new survey of employers, American colleges don’t produce enough qualified graduates for today’s workforce. Among the complaints: […]
description: According to a new survey of employers, American colleges don’t produce enough qualified graduates for today’s workforce. Among the complaints: […]
contentencoded:
According to a new survey of employers, American colleges don’t produce enough qualified graduates for today’s workforce. Among the complaints: colleges aren’t teaching skills like communication, decision-making and analytical thinking.


Guest: Amy Scott, Education Correspondent for APM’s Marketplace program.


Read more about this survey and listen to Amy Scott’s report.
